title: I May Go to Hell, But I'll be Coloring on the Way Down: A Swear Word Adult Coloring Book
description: My best friend told me I might go to hell for making this coloring book. I looked my buddy straight in the eye and said, "I may go to hell, but I'll be coloring on the way down!" Of course my friend was kidding. This is all just hilarious and innocent fun. Right? Of course!  Enjoy the therapeutic benefits of coloring, and at the same time release a little pent up frustration with all of the dirty little swear words laced throughout this insane Adult Coloring Book!  Get F$%$ing started today! *24 great designs to color *No bleed through because every coloring page is on a separate piece of paper. * Single-sided pages are sized at 8.5 x 11" for easy printing and framing*Anti-stress management *Flowers, Mandalas, and many unique patterns *Swear words or dirty phrases on every coloring page. Uncensored! *Use your own coloring tools. Colored pencils, crayons or markers.  This coloring book is meant for adults only.
author: Swearing N' Coloring
